= Plottable Pages =
  * GenericPlottables: describes plottables that can be used for all plot components
  * [1DPlottables  1DPlottables]: describes plottable elements for the line
  * [2DPlottables  2DPlottables]: describes plottable elements for the plane
  * [3DPlottables  3DPlottables]: describes plottable elements for 3d space
